sample-description.title: Open with more than a page full of comments
sample-description.description: The forum is open as normal and the user is logged in. There are more posts than can be displayed on one page so the paging links should appear.

H2G2.USERAGENT: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-GB; rv:1.7.12) Gecko/20050919 Firefox/1.0.7

DNACOMMENTTEXT.CLOSINGTIMESOON: Please note: this debate will close in minutes.
DNACOMMENTTEXT.COUNTDOWNDISPLAY: Please click the button below to submit your comment.
DNACOMMENTTEXT.EMERGENCYCLOSEDMESSAGE: This debate is temporarily closed, please try again later. Our usual opening times are listed below.
DNACOMMENTTEXT.LOGGEDINWELCOME: You are currently signed in.Click here to sign out.
DNACOMMENTTEXT.NOTLOGGEDINWELCOME: You need to sign in to contribute to this page. If you're new to 6 Music, creating your membership is quick and easy.
DNACOMMENTTEXT.NUMBEROFPOSTSMESSAGE: This page has shown and hidden due to moderation.
DNACOMMENTTEXT.OPENUNTILMESSAGE: This debate will be open until .
DNACOMMENTTEXT.POSTMODLABEL: All posts are post-moderated. What does this mean?
DNACOMMENTTEXT.PREMODLABEL: All posts are pre-moderated. What does this mean?
DNACOMMENTTEXT.PREMODMESSAGE:
Where's my comment?
All new members are pre-moderated initially, which means that there will be a short delay between when you post your comment and when it appears while one of our moderators checks it.
DNACOMMENTTEXT.PROFANITYMESSAGE: Your posting was blocked because it contained the word ''
DNACOMMENTTEXT.SCHEDULEDCLOSEDMESSAGE: This debate is closed for the night. It will reopen at .
DNACOMMENTTEXT.UNMODLABEL: All posts are reactively moderated. What does this mean?

SITECONFIG.PROMOBODY: The BBC has created several special topics on a number of other messageboards for discussing the election. Messages posted to this board discussing election campaign issues will be removed. All discussion of issues relating to the general election should take place on one of the special topics created for this purpose. Read the BBC Election Guidelines page for links to the election debate areas, plus details of the BBC's guidelines for election discussions. Thanks!

SITEOPTION.NAME: DefaultShow
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: The default number articles to show for article search

SITEOPTION.NAME: GenerateHotlist
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: The flag to say whether to generate the hotlist for article search or not

SITEOPTION.NAME: HTMLCaching
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Turns HTML caching on for this site

SITEOPTION.NAME: HTMLCachingExpiryTime
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: HTML cache files expire after this many seconds

SITEOPTION.NAME: DefaultDuration
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: The default number of days the forum will open for, after which it automatically closes

SITEOPTION.NAME: DefaultShow
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: The default number comments to show for comment forums

SITEOPTION.NAME: EmailAddressFilter
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if this site requires post email filtering

SITEOPTION.NAME: PostFreq
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Number of seconds that must elapse before a user can post again

SITEOPTION.NAME: AllowOwnerHiding
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if this site is going to allow Owners to Hide another users comments

SITEOPTION.NAME: IsMessageboard
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if this site is a messageboard

SITEOPTION.NAME: IsURLFiltered
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if this site is to be url filtered

SITEOPTION.NAME: KeyPhrases
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if site supports key phrases.

SITEOPTION.NAME: SiteIsPrivate
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: If true, this site's content won't get pulled out on lists in any other site

SITEOPTION.NAME: UseSystemMessages
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if this site is going to use system messages

SITEOPTION.NAME: AllowExternalLinks
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if this site is going to allow media assets with external links

SITEOPTION.NAME: ReturnInCategoryList
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if this site is going to use system messages

SITEOPTION.NAME: DistressMsgUserId
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Allows distress messages to be authored with the given user Id.

SITEOPTION.NAME: PremoderateNicknameChanges
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Controls nickname moderation logic on a pre moderated site. If 1 then site nickname changes and new user nicknames are premoderated. If 0 then nickname changes and new user nicknames are postmoderated. NB: Nickname changes on Child sites are always premoderated, regardless of this setting.

SITEOPTION.NAME: ProcessPreMod
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set this if premod posts are only to appear after they have been moderated.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeClubs
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if information on club membership and club activity is to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeJournal
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if user journals are to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeLinks
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if links (aka clippings) are to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeNoticeboard
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if noticeboard is to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludePostcoder
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if postcoder information is to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludePrivateForums
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if private forum is to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeRecentGuideEntries
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if users recently written or approved GuideEntryies are to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeRecentPosts
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if recent posts are to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeSiteOptions
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if siteoptions are to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeTaggedNodes
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if nodes the user is tagged to are to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeUploads
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if information on uploads is to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeUsersGuideEntry
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if user guide entry (homepage) is to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeUsersGuideEntryForum
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if users public message forum is to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: IncludeWatchInfo
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set if information on watched and watching users is to be included in personal spaces.

SITEOPTION.NAME: PostCountThreshold
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set this value to specify the number of posts a user must submit before leaving the automatic premod state after joining a site

SITEOPTION.NAME: PreModDuration
SITEOPTION.DESCRIPTION: Set this value to specify the number of minutes a user is automatically in premod after joining a site. PostCountThreshold overrides this value

PARAMETER.NAME: _ns
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Force the framework to recache the static site list. Admin use only.

PARAMETER.NAME: _si
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Site name as extracted from the URL. Internal use only.

PARAMETER.NAME: skin
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Preferred skin to use. Overrides user preference and the URL skin name. Only skins which belong to the current site are valid. An invalid skin will be ignored

PARAMETER.NAME: _sk
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Skin passed in as part of the URL. /dna/sitename/skinname/pagetype will be transformed so that the _sk parameter contains the skin specified by the URL

PARAMETER.NAME: s_sync
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: User's details must be synchronised with the data in SSO.

PARAMETER.NAME: _sk
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Skin name passed in via the URL

PARAMETER.NAME: _sk
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Skin name passed in via the URL

PARAMETER.NAME: dnauid
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: A unique ID for this set of comments. GUIDs are preferred but any string is acceptable as long as you can be sure it's unique for the page the comments are on

PARAMETER.NAME: dnaaction
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Action to take on this request. 'add' is the only action currently recognised

PARAMETER.NAME: dnaerrortype
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The type of error caused by the previous action. This parameter is used by the framework to pass errors back to the host page embedded comments so that a response can be displayed to the user. See also dnaerrormessage

PARAMETER.NAME: moduserid
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: UserID of the user whose message has been premoderated. Passed in by the framework, internal use only.

PARAMETER.NAME: dnauid
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: A unique ID for this set of comments. GUIDs are preferred but any string is acceptable as long as you can be sure it's unique for the page the comments are on

PARAMETER.NAME: dnahostpageurl
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The URL of the page in which the comment box is embedded.

PARAMETER.NAME: dnahostpageurl
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The URL of the page in which the comment box is embedded.

PARAMETER.NAME: dnainitialtitle
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: An Initial title for the comment box, which might be displayed on a list of comment boxes

PARAMETER.NAME: dnainitialtitle
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: An Initial title for the comment box, which might be displayed on a list of comment boxes

PARAMETER.NAME: dnafrom
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Zero-based index of the lowest numbered post in the comment list to be shown on the page

PARAMETER.NAME: dnato
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Zero-based index of the highest-numered post in the comment list to be shown on the page

PARAMETER.NAME: dnashow
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number of posts to show (in the absence of dnafrom and dnato parameters).

PARAMETER.NAME: dnainitialmodstatus
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Desired initial moderation status of this comment box. Only use this parameter if you want to explicitly override the moderation status of a comment box at the point of creation. This paramter will not change the status of an existing comment box. Possible values are 'reactive', 'postmod' and 'premod'

PARAMETER.NAME: dnaforumclosedate
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The date that the forum should close

PARAMETER.NAME: dnaforumduration
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: The number of days starting from now that the forum will be open for

PARAMETER.NAME: s_dnaheadinglevel
PARAMETER.DESCRIPTION: Parameters starting s_ are passed and used by the skin and generally have no effect on the server side
